title: Client Update Critical Error
body:
Hi, so every so often I hear people say that when they tried to updaate it had issues and just recently I had said issue.
I went to download the latest update when it stopped at 99% and wouldn't go any further I closed the upload download and re opened league of legends and I now get this infinite cycle of the files need to be repaired restart now, files need to be downloaded ok, restart now, and then back to the begining.
I have also seen another one where it sairs repairing but the status bar doesn't actually move and stagnates.

Please fix.

replies.body:
Try running a manual **client repair** if you can through settings (the gear icon top right) > Initiate Full Repair.

If that doesn't work try **reinstalling the game** with the [Hextech Repair Tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202539040-Reinstalling-League-of-Legends).

If that still doesn't fix your issue **submit a ticket** to [Player Support](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and they should be able to help you further.

Every patch get's 99.9% complete then bugs out.
It has been happening for a long time.

Repairs, rollbacks and re-installations are the norm for LoL, the 3 R's.
Odd, I've never had any issues with patching, but it could also be your self proclaimed toaster struggling :P
